definition: scene which recalls past memories (idiom)/evocative of the past/reminiscent/to arouse deep feelings
to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions
bright/circumstance/scenery
surname Jing
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
feeling/emotion/passion/situation

sentences.english: Your leaving made me look weak so much, even nearly to fall apart once meet our perious memories.
sentences.chinese: 你的離開，讓我變得脆弱，一旦觸景生情就要崩潰。

sentences.english: Many are visibly moved, even as the cameras click and flash.
sentences.chinese: 相機咔嚓的閃耀着，許多人明顯的觸景生情了。

sentences.english: I missing U so much, my dearest.
sentences.chinese: 觸景生情，我也很想家吖。

definition: words do not convey the meaning/poorly expressed/senseless/inarticulate
to snigger/to titter
to be at a loss for words/speechless
words still ringing in one's ears (idiom)
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
unexpected misfortune/unexpected accident/sudden death
to keep silent
to guide patiently and systematically (idiom)
to feel disheartened
unlucky
music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
at one's ease/carefree
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
skin-deep/superficial/shallow
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
